Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Hi flametoken, thanks for good question! There's no central data storage in Disciplina just because of the privacy issues. The student needs to register via the educational institutions he studies in. The educational institutions store all the meta about their students (their names, photos if applicable, etc.), just like they do now. They also store the mappings between the student's DISCIPLINA address and his personal data.  We, as Disciplina, can only guarantee that a student with DISCIPLINA address "A" received a grade "B" for a certain course "C" in an educational institution with DISCIPLINA address "E". All the personalization is done via overlay protocols (probably like disciplina name service on top of the blockchain or some centralized services). The recruiters are expected to do their due diligence and check whether the educational institution indeed has the address "E", e.g. by checking the website of the organization.  The educational institutions are responsible for compliance with the regulations, like they are now. DISCIPLINA doesn't introduce any new challenges in this respect.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: CEMS White Nights: How it happened  At the beginning of summer, St Petersburg saw its fifth CEMS White Nights, an annual international conference with the aim to unite the Global Alliance in Management Education (CEMS) from around the world. This year‚Äôs theme was ‚Äòthe 4th Industrial Revolution: Challenges & Opportunities‚Äô. As part of the conference, lectures were conducted on how to create a successful project, to improve its efficiency, to develop its economics, and much more.  The DISCIPLINA team was invited to participate. The team was represented by Roman Alterman, with a lecture titled ‚ÄúICO trends: how to raise your cap in a minute‚Äù.  Roman shared his experiences from the recently completed RoadShow around Asia, highlighted the important moments that should be noted by any project that is planning an ICO, and underlined the mistakes often made by beginner crowdfunders. The audience loved the talk, enthusiastically participating in the Q&A, and even approaching Roman during the conference breaks.  The conference was a pleasurable success, and ended with a nighttime cruise of the Neva river.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: CAMPUS by DISCIPLINA    The team of DISCIPLINA, the blockchain project for education and recruiting, is creating Campus ‚Äî an incubator, in which projects that use the DISCIPLINA blockchain or function within its ecosystem will have the opportunity to receive the necessary support and investment.  The mission of Campus is to make positive changes in the education and recruiting spheres, to develop the DISCIPLINA ecosystem, and to attract qualified blockchain specialists.  The incubator will provide projects with financing in the amount between $50,000 and $200,000 USD in the course of every seed round.  Besides targeted financing, candidate projects will be given other kinds of support, such as: a coworking space in every corner of the globe; technical consultations by authoritative blockchain developers who have experience coding in one of the TOP-10 cryptocurrencies; consultations by advisors with extensive experience in all spheres; consultations by legal advisors;  The Campus team will consider both products and technologies being developed from scratch, and projects aimed at improving and optimizing already existing products for their further use in the DISCIPLINA network. Any project from around the world can apply to participate in the incubator. Priority will be given to products related to the education and recruiting spheres. However, products designed to store and process personal profiles and statistics may also be considered. More detailed information on applications conditions and deadlines will be announced later.  Stay tuned!

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Our supporters: advisors  In the course of the preparation for the tokensale, the DISCIPLINA team has participated in many different conferences around the globe, giving talks on the main ideas, goals, and principles of the project.  While developing relationships with the world blockchain community, we met many people and organizations who were genuinely interested in the development of our project. Some of these people have later joined our team of advisors:  - Kenji Sasaki - co-founder of the Cardano cryptocurrency, CEO Next Chymia Consulting HK. - Jason King - founder of Sean‚Äôs Outpost and Unsung.org, co-founder of the world‚Äôs first accredited school for blockchain called Academy. - Antonio Menedez-Sierra - specialist in the fields of recruiting, HR, and legal, has a Masters Degree in Banking and Finance. - George Basiladze - CEO of Cryptopay ‚Äì a provider of digital wallet services.  They continue providing our project with the necessary support and assistance in technological and marketing development.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA partners  The DISCIPLINA team has participated in many conferences around the globe to represent their project and develop relationships with the world blockchain community. Thanks to the genuine interest of many people and organizations, we managed to establish partnerships with 8 reputable companies, which are:  ‚Ä¢ Academy School of Blockchain, the world‚Äôs first accredited school that provides education in the field of blockchain development. Academy is a member of the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools (SACS-CASI) and is an internationally recognized higher education institution.  ‚Ä¢ Serokell, a team of software developers that is primarily known for the development of the Cardano cryptocurrency. They are currently among the full-time participants of the DISCIPLINA team.  ‚Ä¢ Next Chymia Consulting HK Limited, an international consulting group in the field of blockchain and financial services.  ‚Ä¢ Cryptopay, an online wallet where users can easily store and spend their money in bitcoin, Euros, British pounds or US dollars. The users of DISCIPLINA platform will be able to issue a Cryptopay co-branding plastic card for their use.  ‚Ä¢ TeachMePlease‚Ää, ‚Ääa platform to search for online and offline courses that currently has over 1500 educational institutions and more than 20,000 classes registered.  ‚Ä¢ HappyMod, the global leader in blockchain marketing and community engagement. Their team has all kinds of skills and abilities, providing a high level of service.  ‚Ä¢ Renaissance Digital Assets, an investment and consulting company in the field of blockchain that provides extensive ICO advisory services.  ‚Ä¢ Kosmos Asset Management, an investment management firm based in Sydney.   The DISCIPLINA team will continue cooperating with the above-mentioned projects and thanks them for their trust.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA Tokensale is finished!  The DISCIPLINA team is happy to announce that the project‚Äôs ICO has finished!  By the start of public presale, the project had raised 28691.88 ETH. By the beginning of public tokensale the funds had reached 29060.04 ETH. Tokensale has been stopped on July 19 at 12:25 UTC due to the fact that the project has reached its hardcap. The project team would like to thank everyone for support and participating in the campaign. It was an important step for all of us! The team is currently finishing its work on the project alpha-version that will soon be available on the website.  Stay tuned!

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Important information for the DISCIPLINA tokensale participants!  All participants must go through the KYC procedure and provide their Withdrawal addresses in the relevant section of dashboard until July 31. The tokens will be transferred to the specified address after the transaction audit by August 20, 2018.  These conditions are obligatory to follow. Otherwise, you WON‚ÄôT BE ABLE to withdraw your tokens through the dashboard.  Attention! If you don‚Äôt pass KYC procedure or fail to provide the Withdrawal address in time, your tokens will be transferred to a temporary address where they will be stored until September 20, 2018. Unclaimed tokens will be burnt.  Token transactions between the addresses are prohibited until August 21, 2018 unless the participant has chosen the option of locking his tokens. Tokens awarded for participating in bounty, airdrop and other promotional campaigns will be locked for 1 month (until September 20, 2018).

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: How it happened: Japan Blockchain Conference  On June 26-27, 2018, the Japan Blockchain Conference - one of the greatest events in the field of blockchain - gathered various project from all over the world, including DISCIPLINA, in Tokyo. The visitors had the opportunity to listen to the speeches of such authoritative speakers as Roger Ver, the CEO bitcoin.com, Toni Lane Casserly, the co-founder of CoinTelegraph, Yoshitaka Kitao, the CEO SBI Representative and many others.  DISCIPLINA was represented by Roman Alterman, the head of the blockchain project. He gave a talk explaining the main ideas, goals, and principles of DISCIPLINA - the first blockchain that will allow to keep a unified register of academic achievements and qualifications in order to generate a personal score.  Click here to watch an abstract of the DISCIPLINA presentation on the Japan Blockchain Conference: https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=2&v=oemONE0LhLk

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA pre-sale. Start today!  The DISCIPLINA team is glad to remind that the public pre-sale starts today. It will launch at 14:00 UTC and last until July 18 at 13:59 UTC.  All participants of the public pre-sale will receive a 10% bonus. You will get a chance to apply for token freezing, which will give you up to 6% bonus. The minimum purchase amount is 10 ETH. Follow the link below to find out the instruction on how to work with the participant dashboard: https://blog.disciplina.io/posts/disciplina-pre-sale-instruction  All participants must go through the KYC procedure. Follow the link to learn more about it: https://blog.disciplina.io/posts/important-information-for-the-disciplina-tokensale-participants  The public tokensale will start on July 18 at 14:00 UTC and will last until July 19 at 13:59 UTC.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: If a grade is confirmed and the proofs are uploaded to the public chain ‚Äî it's there forever. The only way to correct the grade now is to issue another one ‚Äî both grades would remain on the chain, and the recruiters would probably consider the latest one to be true. However, how the recruiters' app would handle such cases are up to the application developers.  If the grade is not yet confirmed (the root hash of the grades is not yet published by the educator), the educator can make corrections to the private transactions. The speed of the private chain is configured by each educator independently (e.g. an educator can publish proofs once a semester, or every day, or once a year ‚Äî we do not put any restrictions except the linear block publication fee).  Generally, educators are incentivized to be as truthful in their assessments as possible due to the fact that we have a web of trust integrated in our protocol. If the grades issued by an educator do not correspond to the knowledge of its students, other educators and recruiters will notice it. They will express their opinions on the quality of assessment, and after some sufficiently large period of time the rating of the lying educator would decrease.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Ecosystem of DISCIPLINA   DISCIPLINA unites students, educational institutions (including private tutors), employers and recruiters. The users will interact with each other and the DISCIPLINA platform through applications with a convenient interface, providing a wide range of platform functions.  DISCIPLINA is an open-source blockchain, which can be used as a basis for application development by anyone.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Token technical pool  In traditional pseudo-decentralised models, such as PoS with compulsory delegation for instance, the key organisation is responsible for the entire community over a long period of time. The performance of the entire system depends on this organisation, and not on the community. In order to ensure real decentralisation, a technical token pool will be formed after the launch of MainNet. This will prevent one stakeholder to have more than a 50% share and thus could influence the functioning of the network. Technical pool will be formed in such a way that the share of tokens from the total volume of token issue will be 45%, and this will be distributed between three independent organisations. Thus, tokens will be distributed in the following ratio:   More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Data Security in DISCIPLINA  The DISCIPLINA architecture stores the data on student academic achievement on the private chains of educational institutions. This could cause the problem of data unavailability in the event that that educational institution stops using the network or that their equipment malfunctions. DISCIPLINA solves this problem by also storing the copies of all the data in student‚Äôs personal profile ‚Äì thus it will be easy to prove the authenticity of the data by accessing the old records in public chain and checking the hashes.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Unlike traditional PoW mining, the DISCIPLINA provides energy-efficient PoS minting. The network rewards the users proportionally to the volume of DSCP tokens on the balance of each other.  The reward to minters will come both from a part of the commission earned on transactions, and in tokens from the technical pool. The size of the reward distributed from the technical pool will continuously be reduced in such a way that the pool itself will never run out.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: User mutual payments and prices in DSCP  Despite the fact that technically the transactions between ecosystem members will be done in token form, the account balance and course prices will be displayed in fiduciary currencies and will be automatically converted to DSCP tokens according to the current exchange rate.  Users will be able to pay for the courses and lessons in tokens, and make payments to another user or to an exchange. Services that integrate the DISCIPLINA blockchain platform into their technological processes will be able to use native tokens or any other financial infrastructure for their transactions.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: That is a good question!  The educational and recruiting market is huge, it would be strange if no one targeted it. First of all, there are such projects as BitDegree, EchoLink, ODEM and so on. Their goal is to store all the diplomas from people all over the world in the Ethereum public ledger ‚Äî this is illegal in most of the countries including Russia and EU due to privacy regulations. There is also Sony Global Education project, based on Hyperledger, that aims on storing educational records in a consortium blockchain. This is a better solution, but it does not suit the needs of HR ‚Äî there will be no opportunities for trustless validation of the certificates.  Contrary to the solutions I described, our project aims at providing both privacy and verifiability of the data. There is no existing platform upon which we can build such a system (neither Ethereum, nor Hyperledger really suit our requirements). That is why we are developing our own blockchain architecture.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA PoS Consensus Algorithm   To check the validity of transactions in public chain, so-called ¬´Witnesses¬ª will use a consensus algorithm based on Proof-of-Stake technology, which provides the high speed and low price of transaction. The report on PoS algorithm actualisation is delineated in greater detail in the technical documentation of the project. The Witnesses, as in other cryptocurrencies, will be rewarded for the launch of each block with commission fees from transactions made in that block. The probability that the Witness will become the block-leader is proportional to the number of tokens on his account.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Why are we developing our own blockchain architecture?  DISCIPLINA will store confidential information, such as the courses, students‚Äô tasks, grades, and test results. Therefore public blockchain solutions, which store all of their transactions in open access ‚Äî Ethereum or EOS, for example ‚Äî are unacceptable. At the same time, private blockchain solutions, such as Hyperledger, do not provide enough verifiability of the data stored on them.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Data Privacy in DISCIPLINA  Student will be able to fully or partially deny access to his personal data. User personal data is stored on the private chains of the educational institutions. The public part of the network has only hashes of this data. Thus, private data remains reliable and safe at the same time.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA tokensale participant profile (Web Wallet)  To take part in the tokensale, every potential participant needs to register their Web Wallet account.disciplina.io using their email address. A profile will be created for you, where you will be able to find all the relevant information about the tokensale, you personal deposit, bonuses received, and the addresses of the deposit wallets for each accepted currency. Every participant will go through identity verification (KYC/AML). If you are a US citizen, you will also have to confirm your status as an ‚Äúaccredited investor‚Äù.  If you want to invest using another type of cryptocurrency, please exchange it through Shapeshift, Changelly, or other exchange services.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Data Disclosure Algorithm in DISCIPLINA  When it comes to sale of private data, it is important to guarantee the integrity of such deals. Our team has developed a protocol that guarantees the transmission of valid data in return for a transaction in cryptocurrency. When an educational institution sends data that has not been verified in the public blockchain (for example, if student‚Äôs grade was updated) to the buyer, the buyer doesn‚Äôt lose his money, but it is the educational institution that is fined a fixed amount. At the same time, there will be no disclosure of the transmitted data to third parties, since only the anonymised invalid part of the data has to be disclosed.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: The usage of DSCP tokens   The main payment instrument in applications using the DISCIPLINA blockchain will be the DSCP token together with a smaller payment unit called Logic, equivalent to fractions of DSCP. The DSCP token, a token of ERC20 standard that will be distributed during the token sale, will be converted to native tokens in a 1:1 ratio after the start of DISCIPLINA MainNet. Students located in Moscow can enroll in courses in San-Francisco. It will be easy for a teacher from the US to receive payments from a student that lives in Russia ‚Äì the procedure will not involve any bureaucratic problems or commission fees to mediatorial banks.  Smart-contracts will guarantee the safety of the deal for both parties regardless of any external factors.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA: ¬´Web Of Trust¬ª  Using the Web Of Trust, the users will be able to set the level of trust in each other themselves.  To protect the system from fictitious educational institutions, DISCIPLINA has an inbuilt Web of Trust, analogous to PGP, in its protocol. Each user will be able to choose the system participants they trust. The level of trust in the other system members will be calculated individually for each user. Thus our network has no ‚Äúverification centres‚Äù, which have an unlimited right to register or refuse the registration of an educational institution. Our Web Of Trust will allow recruiters to know which educational institutions are worth cooperating with and which are not. The value of the grade given to the student will depend on the rating of the educational institution at the time the grade was awarded.   More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Despite the fact that the DISCIPLINA blockchain platform is being created primarily for the field of education, it uses all the capabilities both of blockchain technologies and of other recent trends in the fields of computer technologies and distributed systems. It is a wholly universal blockchain platform, well-suited for any other project that deals with the storage of personal data, such as work achievements or medical records.  Thus, DISCIPLINA will become a multifunctional open blockchain that can be used by any services to manage personal achievements, experiences and other data.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Why are we developing our own blockchain architecture?  DISCIPLINA will store confidential information, such as the courses, students‚Äô tasks, grades, and test results. Therefore public blockchain solutions, which store all of their transactions in open access ‚Äî Ethereum or EOS, for example ‚Äî are unacceptable. At the same time, private blockchain solutions, such as Hyperledger, do not provide enough verifiability of the data stored on them.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Data Privacy in DISCIPLINA  Student will be able to fully or partially deny access to his personal data. User personal data is stored on the private chains of the educational institutions. The public part of the network has only hashes of this data. Thus, private data remains reliable and safe at the same time.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf  [/center]

A profile will be created for you, where you will be able to find all the relevant information about the tokensale, you personal deposit, bonuses received, and the addresses of the deposit wallets for each accepted currency. Every participant will go through identity verification (KYC/AML). If you are a US citizen, you will also have to confirm your status as an ‚Äúaccredited investor‚Äù.  If you want to invest using another type of cryptocurrency, please exchange it through Shapeshift, Changelly, or other exchange services.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Body: Ecosystem of DISCIPLINA   DISCIPLINA unites students, educational institutions (including private tutors), employers and recruiters. The users will interact with each other and the DISCIPLINA platform through applications with a convenient interface, providing a wide range of platform functions.  DISCIPLINA is an open-source blockchain, which can be used as a basis for application development by anyone.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Data Security in DISCIPLINA  The DISCIPLINA architecture stores the data on student academic achievement on the private chains of educational institutions. This could cause the problem of data unavailability in the event that that educational institution stops using the network or that their equipment malfunctions. DISCIPLINA solves this problem by also storing the copies of all the data in student‚Äôs personal profile ‚Äì thus it will be easy to prove the authenticity of the data by accessing the old records in public chain and checking the hashes.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Token technical pool  In traditional pseudo-decentralised models, such as PoS with compulsory delegation for instance, the key organisation is responsible for the entire community over a long period of time. The performance of the entire system depends on this organisation, and not on the community. In order to ensure real decentralisation, a technical token pool will be formed after the launch of MainNet. This will prevent one stakeholder to have more than a 50% share and thus could influence the functioning of the network. Technical pool will be formed in such a way that the share of tokens from the total volume of token issue will be 45%, and this will be distributed between three independent organisations.  Thus, tokens will be distributed in the following ratio:    More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Ecosystem Participants  Academic institutions - state and private offline and online organisations, children‚Äôs educational institutions, universities, academies, etc.   Students - any person that is studying, or would like to find an educational programme for themselves or for their friends and family.   Tutors - offline and online tutors, coaches, instructors, teachers, psychologists, mentors, etc.   Recruiting specialist - recruiting agencies, private recruiting specialists, platforms for personnel search and recruitment, employers and entrepreneurs.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: User mutual payments and prices in DSCP   Despite the fact that technically the transactions between ecosystem members will be done in token form, the account balance and course prices will be displayed in fiduciary currencies and will be automatically converted to DSCP tokens according to the current exchange rate.  Users will be able to pay for the courses and lessons in tokens, and make payments to another user or to an exchange. Services that integrate the DISCIPLINA blockchain platform into their technological processes will be able to use native tokens or any other financial infrastructure for their transactions.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: The usage of DSCP tokens  The main payment instrument in applications using the DISCIPLINA blockchain will be the DSCP token together with a smaller payment unit called Logic, equivalent to fractions of DSCP. The DSCP token, a token of ERC20 standard that will be distributed during the crowdsale, will be converted to native tokens in a 1:1 ratio after the start of DISCIPLINA MainNet.  Students located in Moscow can enroll in courses in San-Francisco. It will be easy for a teacher from the US to receive payments from a student that lives in Russia ‚Äì the procedure will not involve any bureaucratic problems or commission fees to mediatorial banks.  Smart-contracts will guarantee the safety of the deal for both parties regardless of any external factors.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: pupuphan19
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Disciplina is being implemented by TeachMePlease team in partnership with Serokell ‚Äì international company that specializes in development of distributed systems. To protect the system from fictitious educational institutions, Disciplina has an inbuilt Web of Trust, analogous to PGP, in its protocol. Each user will be able to choose the system participants they trust. Using the Web Of Trust, the users will be able to set the level of trust in each other themselves.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA integration into other services  DISCIPLINA is an open-source blockchain. Any educational or recruiting service will be able to use it in their projects that store and process the personal data. The functions of the platform will be performed through the DISCIPLINA node. The platform will provide the public API for the convenient interoperation of the services with the DISCIPLINA nodes.   You can find detailed information about the technical realisation in our technical document, which is constantly updated to reflect recent changes: https://disciplina.io/yellowpaper.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Unlike traditional PoW mining, the DISCIPLINA provides energy-efficient PoS minting. The network rewards the users proportionally to the volume of DSCP tokens on the balance of each other.  The reward to minters will come both from a part of the commission earned on transactions, and in tokens from the technical pool. The size of the reward distributed from the technical pool will continuously be reduced in such a way that the pool itself will never run out.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Key capabilities of the DISCIPLINA blockchain  ‚Ä¢ The opportunity to store the data on personal achievements in digital form and to provide the access to the data through the unified platform, guaranteeing its permanence and credibility ‚Ä¢ An effective search tool by candidates‚Äô achievements and their fields of expertise ‚Ä¢ The opportunity for educational institutions to monetise the data stored on student academic achievement ‚Ä¢ The establishment of a career goal, where the system will develop an optimised educational path, aiming towards employment in a desired company  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Token distribution  78% of issued DSCP tokens will be distributed during the crowdsale, 20% of issued tokens are reserved for company founders, and 2% will be used for the bounty campaign. Out of the 20% of the tokens reserved for the company founders, one half will be frozen for 6 months, and the other half - for 12 months from the end of the crowdsale.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA TokenSale participant profile (Web Wallet)  To take part in the TokenSale, every potential participant needs to register their Web Wallet account.disciplina.io using their email address. A profile will be created for you, where you will be able to find all the relevant information about the TokenSale, you personal deposit, bonuses received, and the addresses of the deposit wallets for each accepted currency. Every participant will go through identity verification (KYC/AML). If you are a US citizen, you will also have to confirm your status as an ‚Äúaccredited investor‚Äù.  If you want to invest using another type of cryptocurrency, please exchange it through Shapeshift, Changelly, or other exchange services.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Why are we developing our own blockchain architecture?  DISCIPLINA will store confidential information, such as the courses, students‚Äô tasks, grades, and test results. Therefore public blockchain solutions, which store all of their transactions in open access ‚Äî Ethereum or EOS, for example ‚Äî are unacceptable. At the same time, private blockchain solutions, such as Hyperledger, do not provide enough verifiability of the data stored on them.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA: ¬´Web Of Trust¬ª  Using the Web Of Trust, the users will be able to set the level of trust in each other themselves. To protect the system from fictitious educational institutions, DISCIPLINA has an inbuilt Web of Trust, analogous to PGP, in its protocol. Each user will be able to choose the system participants they trust. The level of trust in the other system members will be calculated individually for each user. Thus our network has no ‚Äúverification centres‚Äù, which have an unlimited right to register or refuse the registration of an educational institution. Our Web Of Trust will allow recruiters to know which educational institutions are worth cooperating with and which are not. The value of the grade given to the student will depend on the rating of the educational institution at the time the grade was awarded.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Data Disclosure Algorithm  When it comes to sale of private data, it is important to guarantee the integrity of such deals. Our team has developed a protocol that guarantees the transmission of valid data in return for a transaction in cryptocurrency. When an educational institution sends data that has not been verified in the public blockchain (for example, if student‚Äôs grade was updated) to the buyer, the buyer doesn‚Äôt lose his money, but it is the educational institution that is fined a fixed amount. At the same time, there will be no disclosure of the transmitted data to third parties, since only the anonymised invalid part of the data has to be disclosed.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: PoS Consensus Algorithm  in DISCIPLINA  To check the validity of transactions in public chain, so-called ¬´Witnesses¬ª will use a consensus algorithm based on Proof-of-Stake technology, which provides the high speed and low price of transaction. The report on PoS algorithm actualisation is delineated in greater detail in the technical documentation of the project. The Witnesses, as in other cryptocurrencies, will be rewarded for the launch of each block with commission fees from transactions made in that block. The probability that the Witness will become the block-leader is proportional to the number of tokens on his account.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: The usage of DSCP tokens  The main payment instrument in applications using the DISCIPLINA blockchain will be the DSCP token together with a smaller payment unit called Logic, equivalent to fractions of DSCP. The DSCP token, a token of ERC20 standard that will be distributed during the crowdsale, will be converted to native tokens in a 1:1 ratio after the start of DISCIPLINA MainNet.  Students located in Moscow can enroll in courses in San-Francisco. It will be easy for a teacher from the US to receive payments from a student that lives in Russia ‚Äì the procedure will not involve any bureaucratic problems or commission fees to mediatorial banks.  Smart-contracts will guarantee the safety of the deal for both parties regardless of any external factors.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Token technical pool  In traditional pseudo-decentralised models, such as PoS with compulsory delegation for instance, the key organisation is responsible for the entire community over a long period of time. The performance of the entire system depends on this organisation, and not on the community.  In order to ensure real decentralisation, a technical token pool will be formed after the launch of MainNet. This will prevent one stakeholder to have more than a 50% share and thus could influence the functioning of the network. Technical pool will be formed in such a way that the share of tokens from the total volume of token issue will be 45%, and this will be distributed between three independent organisations. Thus, tokens will be distributed in the following ratio:    More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: HappyMod
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Hey Fullspeedin, DISCIPILNA has former Cardano developers in the team  Quote from: Vladrak on April 25, 2018, 05:07:20 PM What are the issues with the education?  As you can imagine this hard to explain in a few words. However, the whitepaper explains this very well. Some examples are:  For the educational institutions: 1) It's not possible to exchange data efficiently on academic achievement between institutions due to the lack of a unified register 2) There is a high risk of paper documentation loss in the archives of educational institutions 3) Paper versions of documents can be easily altered or falsified  For students: 1) The lack of credible ratings of educational institutions and teacher qualifications 2) The lack of trust in the academic qualifications, because of the difficulty in proving their authenticity 3) The difficulty in creating an educational plan to a employment goal  For recruiters: 1) The difficulty of finding the specialist with the required qualifications 2) The lack of trust in the academic qualifications of candidates 3) The impossibility to qualitatively assess the candidates‚Äô work experience  DISCIPLINA will address these problem and create this unified register of academic achievement and qualifications, to generate a scoring system. On their own blockchain.

Author: HappyMod
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Hey Zuhran, appreciate the enthousiasm & there is currently no live tracker, however the smart contract is being prepared! So, stay tuned and you'll be able to know more soon.  Quote from: tophe15 on April 23, 2018, 10:23:12 PM Quote from: HappyMod on April 23, 2018, 01:51:10 AM MEET THE TEAM - UPCOMING AMA  Dear community members. Lately, there have been several changes in the ICO! The Ask-Me-Anything will be broadcasted live on YouTube with Co-founder Ilya Nikiforov and Blockchain Developer Kirill Kuvshinov. Don't miss your chance to ask any questions about DISCIPLINA you may have!  The AMA will be held Wednesday, April 25 at 9AM until 1PM CET time!  How to submit your questions? General questions can always be answered by our team members on Telegram. Please tag your questions with #AMAQ and we will review it to be in the AMA! Questions can be submitted on Telegram/Reddit/BitcoinTalk! (https://t.me/tchmpls) Now I can ask for more of my questions about DISCIPLINA! Thanks for having this Ask-Me-Anything session, is there any chance this will happen in the next following months? Like a monthly AMA so the community will be more updated and be informed well by asking questions?  Hi there! Good suggestion, let's first see how this AMA goes. If it is succesful, we'll see if we can do it more often! Please, feel free to ask any questions you may have on the bitcointalk platform & I'll see if it can be discussed during the AMA!  Quote from: Googlegenius on April 24, 2018, 06:34:11 AM Hello dear admin are you also looking for additional telegram moderators or community managers to manage your social media sites. I am interested to be part of your team.  Hi, feel free to send me a private message

Hey, I would love to help you get on the right track, and I would highly recommend you to read the whitepaper https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf. So, as said TeachMePlease will be the first project DISCIPLINA blockchain will be used for, and you're right there's no borders here.  TeachMePlease allows schools and private tutors from around the world to offer their programmes to potential students anywhere on the planet. DISCIPLINA is a multifunctional blockchain for projects in educational and recruiting field. It provides transparancy of work and creates conditions of maintaining confidentiality and reliability of information added by system participants. It is focused on keeping a unified register of academic achievement and qualificationsto generate a scoring system for every user of the platform.  https://blog.disciplina.io/posts/implementation-of-blockchain-technologies-on-the-market < Here is how blockchain will help!  Tophe15, could you please point out where you have read DISCIPLINA sends funds to the less fotunate kids in the form of a charity institution?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: User mutual payments and prices in DSCP  Despite the fact that technically the transactions between ecosystem members will be done in token form, the account balance and course prices will be displayed in fiduciary currencies and will be automatically converted to DSCP tokens according to the current exchange rate.  Users will be able to pay for the courses and lessons in tokens, and make payments to another user or to an exchange. Services that integrate the DISCIPLINA blockchain platform into their technological processes will be able to use native tokens or any other financial infrastructure for their transactions.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Amazing news has been shared again & thank you for all the positive feedback we receive here on BitcoinTalk! I would love to all invite you to the DISCIPLINA community on Telegram https://t.me/tchmpls. If there are any questions, feel free to ask them either here or on Telegram - questions will be answered a few times a day on Bitcointalk, 24/7 on Telegram!     Hi Hodlvcl, very glad to hear you like the DISCIPLINA project. As you can imagine, there are many legal reasons why there cannot be commented on future exchanges. DISCIPLINA is an utility token, the main payment tool of the DISCIPLINA platform will be the DSCP token. The users of the DISCIPLINA platform will be able to issue a Cryptopay co-branding plastic card with the option of immediate conversion of DSCP tokens to fiat money.  All information that is available will be shared!  Quote from: Kurrie on April 19, 2018, 06:00:57 PM If I understand correctly, the blockchain is available worldwide for any country. Is that it?  Hey Kurrie, that is 100% right! To give you a great example, TeachMePlease will be the first project to use the DISCIPLINA blockchain.  TeachMePlease provides the conditions for efficient and effective cooperation between academic institutions and private tutors, and their students. TeachMePlease has no territorial borders, which allows schools and private tutors from around the world to offer their programmes to potential students anywhere on the planet. Isn't that amazing?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA - multifunctional blockchain!  Despite the fact that the DISCIPLINA blockchain platform is being created primarily for the field of education, it uses all the capabilities both of blockchain technologies and of other recent trends in the fields of computer technologies and distributed systems. It is a wholly universal blockchain platform, well-suited for any other project that deals with the storage of personal data, such as work achievements or medical records.  Thus, DISCIPLINA will become a multifunctional open blockchain that can be used by any services to manage personal achievements, experiences and other data.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA FOUNDATION  This is a non-profit organization created to help the users of services that use DISCIPLINA. The managers of this organization will individually deal with any issues that are related to validating the data and digitalising it, and will provide support in the integration of DISCIPLINA blockchain into the other services. Thus, the services will be able to get a quick start to the implementation of blockchain technologies into their projects.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA integration into other services  DISCIPLINA is an open-source blockchain. Any educational or recruiting service will be able to use it in their projects that store and process the personal data.  The functions of the platform will be performed through the DISCIPLINA node. The platform will provide the public API for the convenient interoperation of the services with the DISCIPLINA nodes.  You can find detailed information about the technical realisation in our technical document, which is constantly updated to reflect recent changes: https://disciplina.io/yellowpaper.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Data Security in DISCIPLINA  The DISCIPLINA architecture stores the data on student academic achievement on the private chains of educational institutions. This could cause the problem of data unavailability in the event that that educational institution stops using the network or that their equipment malfunctions. DISCIPLINA solves this problem by also storing the copies of all the data in student‚Äôs personal profile ‚Äì thus it will be easy to prove the authenticity of the data by accessing the old records in public chain and checking the hashes.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Body: Attention! From 2 April 2018 onwards, the purchase of DSCP tokens will only be possible after initiating a request and receiving an approval.  To become a part of the project and purchase tokens, you will need to fill in a form.The notification letter with the request approval will be sent to the e-mail you provided within 24 hours.  Please note that the withdrawal of funds will be available to all users, even those that did not get onto the Whitelist. If you participated in the bounty campaign or another activity, DSCP tokens will be added to your balance regardless. After the end of the campaign you will be able to go through the KYC/AML identity authentication process and withdraw your tokens onto any ERC20-compatible wallet.  If you have any questions, please contact us at: @tchmpls

A profile will be created for you, where you will be able to find all the relevant information about the crowdsale, you personal deposit, bonuses received, and the addresses of the deposit wallets for each accepted currency. Every participant will go through identity verification (KYC/AML). If you are a US citizen, you will also have to confirm your status as an ‚Äúaccredited investor‚Äù. Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA is a blockchain. Thanks to decentralized architecture DISCIPLINA will validate data which is stored in blocks and it is complicated to forge.  Educational data can be monetized. For example, recruiter can make a request about student‚Äôs grades and university can get some money for that.  Also cryptocurrency makes payments for courses easier. Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: PoS Consensus Algorithm of DISCIPLINA  To check the validity of transactions in public chain, so-called ¬´Witnesses¬ª will use a consensus algorithm based on Proof-of-Stake technology, which provides the high speed and low price of transaction. The report on PoS algorithm actualisation is delineated in greater detail in the technical documentation of the project. The Witnesses, as in other cryptocurrencies, will be rewarded for the launch of each block with commission fees from transactions made in that block. The probability that the Witness will become the block-leader is proportional to the number of tokens on his account.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: prety-love
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Why are we developing our own blockchain architecture?  DISCIPLINA will store confidential information, such as the courses, students‚Äô tasks, grades, and test results. Therefore public blockchain solutions, which store all of their transactions in open access ‚Äî Ethereum or EOS, for example ‚Äî are unacceptable. At the same time, private blockchain solutions, such as Hyperledger, do not provide enough verifiability of the data stored on them.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Monetary policy  78% of the DSCP tokens issued will be distributed during the crowdsale, 20% of the tokens are reserved for company founders, and 2% will be used for the bounty campaign. Funds attracted in the crowdsale will be spent on project development in the following ratio: 40% ‚Äì on marketing, 30% ‚Äì on project development, 15% ‚Äì on sales, 10% ‚Äì on legal services, and 5% ‚Äì additional capital. The additional capital is used to improve the financial stability of the project. Out of the 20% of the tokens reserved for the company founders, one half will be frozen for 6 months, and the other half - for 12 months from the end of the crowdsale.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA GOALS  ‚Ä¢ To create a universal blockchain that will store personal achievements in a digital form and guarantee their permanence and credibility ‚Ä¢ To offer an effective algorithm for candidate search by their fields of expertise ‚Ä¢ To develop a mechanism of monetization of the data stored by the educational institutions  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: The usage of DSCP tokens  The main payment instrument in applications using the DISCIPLINA blockchain will be the DSCP token together with a smaller payment unit called Logic, equivalent to fractions of DSCP. The DSCP token, a token of ERC20 standard that will be distributed during the crowdsale, will be converted to native tokens in a 1:1 ratio after the start of DISCIPLINA MainNet.  Students located in Moscow can enroll in courses in San-Francisco. It will be easy for a teacher from the US to receive payments from a student that lives in Russia ‚Äì the procedure will not involve any bureaucratic problems or commission fees to mediatorial banks.  Smart-contracts will guarantee the safety of the deal for both parties regardless of any external factors.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: 1DSCP=0,00005 ETH or 1ETH=2000DSCP

Author: eviltamer
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Due to the high demand for tokens during the presale period, we set a limit on the sale of 333 ETH per day. This is done in order to maintain the required volume of tokens for the period of the main stage, and give the opportunity to participate in more people.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: User mutual payments and prices in DSCP  Despite the fact that technically the transactions between ecosystem members will be done in token form, the account balance and course prices will be displayed in fiduciary currencies and will be automatically converted to DSCP tokens according to the current exchange rate.  Users will be able to pay for the courses and lessons in tokens, and make payments to another user or to an exchange. Services that integrate the DISCIPLINA blockchain platform into their technological processes will be able to use native tokens or any other financial infrastructure for their transactions.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Data Disclosure Algorithm  Our team has developed a protocol that guarantees the transmission of valid data in return for a transaction in cryptocurrency. When an educational institution sends data that has not been verified in the public blockchain (for example, if student‚Äôs grade was updated) to the buyer, the buyer doesn‚Äôt lose his money, but it is the educational institution that is fined a fixed amount. At the same time, there will be no disclosure of the transmitted data to third parties, since only the anonymised invalid part of the data has to be disclosed.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: First we started to develop TeachMePlease - an educational project. Then we started to see more widely and realised that we can create a blockchain for this project's needs. Also, we came to understand that this kind of blockchain is needed by society, everybody will be able to use for his/her own aims due to open-source nature of it.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA is an open-source blockchain. Any educational or recruiting service will be able to use it in their projects that store and process the personal data.  The functions of the platform will be performed through the DISCIPLINA node. The platform will provide the public API for the convenient interoperation of the services with the DISCIPLINA nodes.  You can find detailed information about the technical realisation in our technical document, which is constantly updated to reflect recent changes: https://disciplina.io/yellowpaper.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Hey guys! Check out Medium update:  DISCIPLINA: Token technical pool  https://medium.com/@tchmpls_events/disciplina-token-technical-pool-fab117301084

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: ¬´Web Of Trust¬ª  Using the Web Of Trust, the users will be able to set the level of trust in each other themselves.  To protect the system from fictitious educational institutions, DISCIPLINA has an inbuilt Web of Trust, analogous to PGP, in its protocol. Each user will be able to choose the system participants they trust. The level of trust in the other system members will be calculated individually for each user. Thus our network has no ‚Äúverification centres‚Äù, which have an unlimited right to register or refuse the registration of an educational institution. Our Web Of Trust will allow recruiters to know which educational institutions are worth cooperating with and which are not. The value of the grade given to the student will depend on the rating of the educational institution at the time the grade was awarded.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Unlike traditional PoW mining, the DISCIPLINA provides energy-efficient PoS minting. The network rewards the users proportionally to the volume of DSCP tokens on the balance of each other.  The reward to minters will come both from a part of the commission earned on transactions, and in tokens from the technical pool. The size of the reward distributed from the technical pool will continuously be reduced in such a way that the pool itself will never run out.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: And did anyone hear about the restriction on the sale of tokens? What is it and why is it?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA is developing in demand of the educational and recruiting spheres. It will store personal data (students achievements, tests, evaluations), that's why public blockchain solutions, which store all of their transactions in open access - Ethereum or EOS - are unacceptable. At the same time, private blockchain solutions, such as Hyperledger, do not provide enough verifiability of data stored on them.  You can find detailed information in whitepaper (on page 7, for example): https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Due to the increased demand for DCSP-tokens and our interest in maximizing the number of DISCIPLINA investors we have to limit daily sales by an amount equivalent to 333 ETH.

Author: zhaojundong
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Hmm...  Can you explain why the team wants to increase the number of investors? I'm just wondering why this platform is so important.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: It's a blockchain's nuances. It's not appopriate when one or few person own the most part of platform. We are developing open-source blockchain that's why we want it will belong to commuty but not to limit number of person which can manage it.

Author: redlay
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Well, obviously, this is necessary in order for an extensive network and make the system work more stable. After all, the more nodes there are on the network, the better it will work. This is the specificity of the PoS algorithm, as I understand it.

Author: zhaojundong
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA architecture provides special technology called "Web of Trust". Using it, the users will be able to set the level of trust in each other to themselves. Sure, you will able to choose client by yourself. But DISCIPLINA makes you search more convinient. For example, you add some rating to one teacher or university and then system automatically calculate your level of trust to another participants.  This scheme shows it:

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: To check the validity of transactions in public chain, so-called ¬´Witnesses¬ª will use a consensus algorithm based on Proof-of-Stake technology, which provides the high speed and low price of transaction. The report on PoS algorithm actualisation is delineated in greater detail in the technical documentation of the project. The Witnesses, as in other cryptocurrencies, will be rewarded for the launch of each block with commission fees from transactions made in that block. The probability that the Witness will become the block-leader is proportional to the number of tokens on his account.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Why are we developing our own blockchain architecture?  DISCIPLINA will store confidential information, such as the courses, students‚Äô tasks, grades, and test results. Therefore public blockchain solutions, which store all of their transactions in open access ‚Äî Ethereum or EOS, for example ‚Äî are unacceptable. At the same time, private blockchain solutions, such as Hyperledger, do not provide enough verifiability of the data stored on them.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: ‚Ä¢   The opportunity to store the data on personal achievements in digital form and provide the access to the data through the unified platform which guarantees its permanence and credibility;  ‚Ä¢   DISCIPLINA is an open-source platform. Every educational or recruiting service will be able to use blockchain in their projects;  ‚Ä¢   Reliable information on ratings, feedbacks and student grades;  ‚Ä¢   Effective search tool by candidates‚Äô achievements and their fields of expertise;  ‚Ä¢   Monetisation of the stored data on student academic achievement through its trade to the recruiters. Fulfillment of obligations by all parties are guaranteed, and the option for cross-border payment provided;  ‚Ä¢   The opportunity of targeted education, when students have a certain milestones by completion of which they will be guaranteed the job in a given organization;

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA will be implemented not only in educational field. It also would be a convinient tool for HR-services. Our blockchain will simplify the search for appopriate candidate by recruiters.  We are developing a blockchain with unique architecture. Sure, the educational and recruiting market is huge, it would be strange if no one targeted it. First of all, there are such projects as BitDegree, EchoLink, ODEM and so on. Their goal is to store all the diplomas from people all over the world in the Ethereum public ledger ‚Äî this is illegal in most of the countries including Russia and EU due to privacy regulations. There is also Sony Global Education project, based on Hyperledger, that aims on storing educational records in a consortium blockchain. This is a better solution, but it does not suit the needs of HR ‚Äî there will be no opportunities for trustless validation of the certificates.  Contrary to the solutions I described, our project aims at providing both privacy and verifiability of the data. There is no existing platform upon which we can build such a system (neither Ethereum, nor Hyperledger really suit our requirements). That is why we are developing our own blockchain architecture.

Author: elrugrim
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA PoS Consensus Algorithm   To check the validity of transactions in public chain, so-called ¬´Witnesses¬ª will use a consensus algorithm based on Proof-of-Stake technology, which provides the high speed and low price of transaction. The report on PoS algorithm actualisation is delineated in greater detail in the technical documentation of the project. The Witnesses, as in other cryptocurrencies, will be rewarded for the launch of each block with commission fees from transactions made in that block. The probability that the Witness will become the block-leader is proportional to the number of tokens on his account.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: The usage of DSCP tokens   The main payment instrument in applications using the DISCIPLINA blockchain will be the DSCP token together with a smaller payment unit named Logic, equivalent to fractions of DSCP. The DSCP token, a token of ERC20 standard that will be distributed during the crowdsale, will be converted to native tokens in a 1:1 ratio after the start of DISCIPLINA MainNet. Students located in Moscow can enroll in courses in San-Francisco. It will be easy for teacher from the US to receive payments from a student that lives in Russia ‚Äì the procedure will not involve any bureaucratic problems or commission fees to mediatorial banks.  Smart-contracts will guarantee the safe deal for both parties regardless of any external factors.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Monetary policy   88% of issued DSCP tokens will be distributed during the crowdsale, 10% of issued tokens are reserved for company founders, and 2% will be used for the bounty campaign.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA crowdsale participant profile (Web Wallet)  To take part in the crowdsale, every potential participant needs to register their Web Wallet account.teachmeplease.io using their email address. A profile will be created for you, where you will be able to find all the relevant information about the crowdsale, you personal deposit, bonuses received, and the addresses of the deposit wallets for each accepted currency. Every participant will go through identity verification (KYC/AML). If you are a US citizen, you will also have to confirm your status as an ‚Äúaccredited investor‚Äù.  If you want to invest using another type of cryptocurrency, please exchange it through Shapeshift, Changelly, or exchange services.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education

It is a wholly universal blockchain platform, well-suited for any other project that deals with the storage of personal data, such as work achievements or medical records.  Thus, DISCIPLINA will become a multifunctional open blockchain that can be used by any services to manage personal achievements, experiences and other data.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: User mutual payments and prices in DSCP  Despite the fact that technically the transactions between ecosystem members will be done in token form, the account balance and course prices will be displayed in fiduciary currencies and will be automatically converted to DSCP tokens according to the current exchange rate.  Users will be able to pay for the courses and lessons in tokens, and make payments to another user or to an exchange. Services that integrate the DISCIPLINA blockchain platform into their technological processes will be able to use native tokens or any other financial infrastructure for their transactions.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Token technical pool  In classical pseudo-decentralised models, such as PoS with compulsory delegation, for example, the key organization is responsible for the entire community over a long period of time. The performance of the entire system depends on this organisation, and not on the community. In order to ensure real decentralization, a technical token pool will be formed after the launch of MainNet. This will prevent one stakeholder to have more than a 50% share and thus could influence the functioning of the network. Technical pool will be formed in such a way that the share of tokens from the total volume of token issue will be 45%, and this will be distributed between three independent organisations. Thus, tokens will be distributed in the following ratio.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA Technologies: Data Disclosure Algorithm  When it comes to the sale of the private data, it is important to guarantee the integrity of such deals. DISCIPLINA team has developed the protocol that guarantees the transmission of the valid data in return for a transaction in cryptocurrency. When an educational institution sends data that has not been verified in the public blockchain (for example, if student‚Äôs grade was updated) to the buyer, the buyer doesn‚Äôt lose his money, but it is the educational institution that is fined a fixed amount. At the same time, there will be no disclosure of the transmitted data to third parties, since only the anonymised invalid part of the data has to be disclosed.  More: https://disciplina.io

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA Technologies: ¬´Web Of Trust¬ª  Using the Web Of Trust, the users will be able to set the level of trust in each other themselves.  To protect the system from fictitious educational institutions, DISCIPLINA has an inbuilt Web of Trust, analogous to PGP, in its protocol. Each user will be able to choose the system participants they trust. The level of trust in the other system members will be calculated individually for each user. DISCIPLINA network thus has no ‚Äúverification centres‚Äù, which have an unlimited right to register or refuse the registration of an educational institution.  Web Of Trust will allow recruiters to know which educational institutions are worth cooperating with and which are not.  The value of the grade given to the student will depend on the rating of the educational institution at the time the grade was awarded.  More: https://disciplina.io

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Ecosystem Participants  Academic institutions State and private offline and online organisations, children‚Äôs educational institutions, universities, academies, etc  Students Any person that is studying, or would like to find an educational programme for themselves or for their friends and family  Tutors Offline and online tutors, coaches, instructors, teachers, psychologists, mentors etc  HR-specialist HR-agencies, private HR-specialists, platforms for personnel search and recruitment, employers and entrepreneurs  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA FOUNDATION   This is a non-profit organization created to help the users of services that use DISCIPLINA. The managers of this organization will individually deal with any issues that are related to validating the data and digitalising it, and will provide support in the integration of DISCIPLINA blockchain into the other services. Thus, the services will be able to get a quick start to the implementation of blockchain technologies into their projects.  More: https://disciplina.io/WhitePaper_eng.pdf

Author: minerjnbe
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: "DISCIPLINA is a blockchain platform for the projects in educational and recruiting spheres. The use of blockchain technology guarantees the transparency of the platform and creates the conditions for maintaining cofidentiality and reliability of information added by ecosystem participants. TeachMePlease will be the first project based on the DISCIPLINA blockchain platform. It provides the conditions for efficient and effective cooperation between academic institutions and private tutors, and their students. TeachMePlease project does not produce educational content, but provides the conditions for its creation and its exchange between users.                 The DISCIPLINA blockchain platform architecture is unique, and other educational projects will be able to utilize it in the future. The platform will contain confidential information: classes, assignments, grades, and test results. Therefore, public blockchain solutions, such as Ethereum or EOS, which have open access to all transactions, cannot be used. At the same time, private blockchain solutions, such as Hyperledger, do not provide enough public verifiability. To ensure full support for the needs of the platform, a wholly new educational blockchain will be developed."   Great idea of addressing the parameters of the education sector through a blockchain representation. My hope that this platform will ease up the difficult tasks usual to an educational institution. Again thumbs up for this project!

Therefore, public blockchain solutions, which store all of their transactions in open access ‚Äî Ethereum or EOS, for example ‚Äî are unacceptable. At the same time, private blockchain solutions, such as Hyperledger, do not provide enough verifiability of the data stored on them.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Hello owenja! Thanks for good question.  We a developing our own, brand-new blockchain, which will be useful for educational and recruiting projects. It will store educational records and provide easy and effective access to that records for recruiters and employers.  And few words about tokens usage. The payments in the projects using DISCIPLINA blockchain will be made in our own cryptocurrency ‚Äì DISCIPLINA native tokens (DSCP). Due to PoS architecture, you will be able to earn DSCP tokens by maintaining node of DISCIPLINA blockchain on your hardware.

Author: tchmpls.events

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: How will DISCIPLINA work?  The validity of blocks within the private blockchains of educational institutions will be controlled by Witnesses. Witnesses manage the public chain of blocks that will record hashes of the private blocks generated by each educational institution. To confirm the validity of blocks the witnesses will use a consensus algorithm. The permanence of the data stored in the private chains is guaranteed.  Educational institutions will be able to trade the stored data and share it with HR-specialists upon their request.  Fairness of this trade is guaranteed by the special designed data disclosure algorithm.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: The idea for the project was conceived in 2015, when Ilya Nikiforov, the company founder, was travelling along the West Coast of the United States, and tried to find surfing courses to enroll in. However, he faced a range of problems. After 3 hours of a long and fruitless search it became obvious that it is very difficult to find current and reliable information about the course you are interested in, to organize education on your holiday or a business trip, or to enroll in a course online without dealing with a manager  More about it https://blog.teachmeplease.io/posts/teachmeplease-the-first-project-based-on-disciplina-an-educational-blockchain-platform

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Hello! Thanks for your question! Educational institutions get profit from the use of the service by trading educational records stored in their private chains. Tokenholders get profit by maintaining master-node and helping the network. Teachers will also receive payment in tokens.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: If you‚Äôre asking about consensus algorithm, Disciplina will use PoS, but the exact PoS algorithm will be described a bit later in technical document. If you mean mining algorithm, Disciplina will use PoS minting instead of classical PoW mining on the platform. You will be able to earn platform tokens by launching the software which helps Disciplina platform to function. The software will not consume a great amount of energy, so you can use your personal computer.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: You're welcome!

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Hello! You can use TeachMePlease for learning using any computer. It will be possible to use DISCIPLINA network a bit later, when the test network will be launched. However, it's useless for ordinary students because DISCIPLINA master node is needed for educators and users who help us to maintain transactions, and currently there are no transactions in the network ((=

Author: esqueleto
