Author: CryptoProfy
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Interesting project, but still there are some more successful competitors out there.  And the main REG FLAG for me is the fact that crypto is not native here. All that could be done(and being done by competitors) without using blockchain and another new shitcoin.  Another RED FLAG: there is no information about the token model. How many tokens will be issued? What blockchain are they going to use? What are commissions for a transaction? Are tokens to be listed anywhere?  I believe there are no drivers for the token price growth, this project doesn't need blockchain, it's more suitable for VC.  Good luck with the project, guys, but I'm not to put my money in.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Hello CryptoProfy! We are glad that you have studied our project. In this project our team in partnership with Serokell are developing our own blockchain architecture. It will be a completely new development. Serokell's professionalism is undeniable, because they already took part in the creation of Cardano (ADA). We will use blockchain technologies to ensure the reliability of the stored educational records. You can examine our Technical paper to find out how we will maintain the veracity of the data and how the tokens we issue are used to protect this process. We are planning to list our token on several exchanges, but their names will not be disclosed yet due to legal. However, I can say that one of them is in the top10 of coinmarketcap. Information of the size of the commission and the model of the token, we really can not yet give, because Now the architecture is only describing, and we have not yet approved all the provisions until the end. In any case, thank you very much for taking the time to examine our project ((=

Author: CryptoProfy
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Thank for quick respond. I don't wanna argue here, but your answers give me another HUGE RED FLAG.  Basically right now on "pre-sale" stage, how you call it, you are selling "nothing" for 0.0005 ETH. It's not even ERC20 token, it's really nothing. And a buyer can't do anything with it. Just wait and pray.  You have nice looking fancy websites, complicated structure, and I have no doubt about the strong team, and blockchain developers.  But could you imagine any sophisticated experienced investor to put a penny in a project without clear valuation and exit strategy? You are betting on stupid hamsters fell in love with fancy graphics.  That's not fair. Shame on you!

Author: Ilya_TeachMePlease
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Its not so.  All pre-sale investors and main stage investors will get ERC20 tokens. And they would be able to withdraw them as soon as they want after main stage complete. You can register at our investor panel account.teachmeplease.io and already now you can provide us with your ERC compatible wallet address.  After that, when our main net will be started all who would have our ERC20 tokens will change them to our Disciplina blockchain tokens as 1=1. Before that you would be able to trade ERC20 token as you want. After you would be able to trade you DSCP tokens as you wish.  We are really sorry that not all that info is fully clear right now, but we are updating our web-site and channels to make it transparent for all. So i will double check now that this info would be posted correctly on all our channels.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: DISCIPLINA is an open platform - any project will be able to use it for making their own solutions based on the platform. For example, DISCIPLINA is a great instrument for headhunting. Another one is monetisation of stored educational records and it on demand provision to HRs.  And TeachMePlease project will become a CRM system based on DISCIPLINA platform with huge amount of convenient tools for organizing the educational process. Thus, educational organizations and students will be able to use TeachMePlease for managing courses and studies and their results would be imported to DISCIPLINA automatically.

Body: I am unable to get my head around the difference between these 2 concepts.How does mintcoin differ from other coins when we say we are minting them rather than mining them?We still have to mine mintcoin if I am correct?

Author: Bloody Mary
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Right now we are mining in the traditional sense of the word, using computing power to find blocks and be rewarded Mintcoins. In a few weeks, the process of generating new coins will change to PoS, and new coins will be generated through what we're calling 'minting' - basically, you are given more coins based on how many you hold. This starts at 20% for the first year. For example, if I had 1 million coins when the minting begins, after a year, I'd have 1,200,000. This process is entirely passive and you do not have to be mining with your computer at all.

Author: Doughy
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: It‚Äôs not clear how the reward for minters is formed. Can you explain, please?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: The reward for minters is formed from the part of commission fee paid by users for the services provided by the platform. For example, when HR-specialist purchases the data on student academic achievement from educational institution, one part from this payment is transacted to the minter as a reward. At the start of our project the commission fee won‚Äôt be enough to cover minter‚Äôs expenses, thus the minter who signed the block will be given a bonus from token technical pool. The size of the reward will gradually decrease tending to zero, and the transaction commission will grow. That‚Äôs how minter‚Äôs income will be maintained.

Author: Doughy
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Disciplina Blockchain Platform ‚Äì a Perfect World for Learning  At the end of November, the TeachMePlease project team started the presale of DSCP tokens for Disciplina - a platform for the educational and recruiting spheres.  TeachMePlease is a service that provides the conditions for efficient and effective cooperation between academic institutions, private tutors, and their students. This is a well-functioning international marketplace, which allows users to post information about the courses, search for lessons according to their interests, pay and enroll in courses online. The main task for project authors is to transform the project into a fully-featured service with convenient tools for its users. To solve this task, the TeachMePlease team is going to implement blockchain technology, which guarantees not only the credibility of learning results, but also the confidentiality of personal and commercial data stored on the platform.  Read more: https://coinidol.com/disciplina-blockchain-platform-a-perfect-world-for-learning/

Author: Doughy
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: how exactly token will be used on the platform?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Tokens will be used for mutual settlements between users, minter benefits, purchase of additional services by educational institutions and educators through applications on the platform, remuneration for the data provided on student academic achievement and payment for the data on candidates received by HR-specialists.

Author: Doughy
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education

Author: Doughy
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: please, describe how they help to support the work of the platform.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: The users will provide Disciplina network with their computing resources by downloading and then running the software, which will perform the following functions: - processing of financial transactions; - signing of new blocks in public blockchain; - provision of disk space; It will be an energy-efficient PoS-minting.

Author: Doughy
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: do you use a regular PoS so I will need to keep a node?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: No, we don't. We‚Äôve studied dozens of projects created so far and now we‚Äôre doing our best to learn from their mistakes. For example, every epoch we‚Äôll choose several blockheaders to increase the resistance of Disciplina network to attacks.

Author: tebessum
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Interesting project,good luck dev

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: The use of fiat payment is undoubtedly an easy solution, but we want to make our project great, thus we think that the use of cryptocurrency will significantly improve the service allowing us to integrate ‚Äúsafe deal‚Äù service, to award minters supporting the platform, to simplify cross-border payments, to monetize the data from educational institutions etc.

Author: Doughy
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Could you tell me more about your platform?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Hello. TeachMePlease.com platform was launched in 2016. You have the opportunity to enroll in courses offered by various educational institutions or private tutors right now!

Author: Doughy
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Why do you think educational institutions will be interested in your platform?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: In addition to the opportunity of monetizing the stored data about the students, educational institutions will be able to use the platform as a convenient CRM-platform for communication with students and effective management of educational processes. So, the main thing is that the platform provides convenient tools for conducting any educational activity and interaction between users. Thus, the platform will be used as a tool for day-to-day work.

Author: Doughy
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Are you really going to counter bureaucracy?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: We don‚Äôt expect the immediate result. First of all, we consider it important to create a high-quality and convenient product for the users. When a great number of teachers start to use the platform, it will be easier to defeat the bureaucracy and integrate into the educational process. This process will take many years. In addition to this, we are planning to create sections with free courses and events devoted to popularization of EdTech.

Author: miseryman
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: how the platform will earn money?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: TeachMePlease platform gets percentage from every payment made by students. Disciplina is an open-source product and everyone (including the members of our team) can earn money by setting up a node and thus maintaining the platform performance.

Author: miseryman
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: So all revenues will be in cryptocurrency?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Yes, that‚Äôs right, all mutual settlements will be made in TMPT tokens. For convenient use of fiat currencies, the user can issue a Cryptopay co-branding plastic card.

Author: Doughy
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Cryptopay works only with USD and BTC, isn‚Äôt it?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: TeachMePlease and Cryptopay made an agreement upon creating a joint product, so the clients will be able to pay in TMPT tokens using Cryptopay plastic cards. So, don't worry, everything will work out beautifully

Author: miseryman
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: hmmm so interesting. okay, at which stock exchanges do you want to list your token?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Despite the fact that listing on exchanges is yet to come, we have already started negotiations with reputable exchanges. So, we expect a good trade turnover.

Author: miseryman
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: will it be bittrex?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: We are planning to list our token on several exchanges, but their names will not be disclosed yet.

Author: miseryman
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: you mentioned something about free lessons once - what does it mean?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: At the moment this section is not available on the website. Later it will include online classes, video lessons or methodological materials available in public domain. After a certain time period of the course being on the platform or after a number of conditions being fulfilled, the materials given during the course would become free for all platform participants. However, it should be noted that the course can be made free of charge only at the request of the course creator.

Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Dear community! We are proud to introduce you to some more details about our project.  TeachMePlease‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääthe first project based on Disciplina, an educational blockchain platform  TeachMePlease is an international platform for the cooperation between educational institutions, tutors and students. This project helps students find and immediately pay for courses, registered by educational organizations or teachers. We can already offer our clients the services of an EdTech platform, but we are moving further. During the course of building this platform we have studied the issues faced by the members of the field of education, and have come to the conclusion that the field itself needs fundamental changes.  Read more on Medium

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Education. Problems and solutions.  Education is becoming more available and decentralised, and as a result of this the students and teachers are facing both unquestionable benefits, and the issues connected with these developments. TeachMePlease will simplify the cooperation between teachers and students worldwide.  Read more

Author: valeryroma1
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: I understand properly that i can provide my electronic CV to the employer? How`s this going to work physically? On the flash drive?

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Hello, valeryroma1! Thank you for the question! Yes, you‚Äôll be able to give your CV to potential employer in electronic form. So, physically all the data is stored in private parts of Disciplina blockchain platform. To provide our users with the effective usage of Disciplina we‚Äôre going to create a number of applications and the first one will be TeachMePlease application. The user works with the application exporting one‚Äôs CV or looking through the information about the student through personal profile on the platform.

Author: Ilya_TeachMePlease
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: In the preparation of TeachMePlease for ICO we have made a detailed study of the market of educational services. We arrived at the conclusion that sphere of education needs to be fully modified and an educational blockchain system can become a solution.  Our partnership with international developer of blockchain systems Serokell gave us insight that we have not only the will but also all the resources needed to create such system.  Due to this, after holding talks with several large investors and funds and receiving their support and endorsement, we decided to postpone ICO until March 2018. We retain the date of the closed pre-sale which will start on November, 27th.  Date change is necessary for detailed elaboration of conception of educational blockchain and for preparing high-quality presentation for all potential participants. In that context TeachMePlease will become the first platform which will highlight necessity, importance and functionality of educational blockchain.  We believe that appearance of educational blockchain will revolutionize the sphere of education and will spur a great number of qualitative changes in related spheres. In the near future we will issue an official press release which will contain detailed information about all the changes in our project and plans. Follow up the information on our official website teachmeplease.io and on our pages in social networks. As for the bounty campaign, work on the part of the tasks is suspended and some new tasks will be added.  The number of your stakes will be fixed and doubled at the restart of ICO in the first quarter of 2018.  We want individually note the work of translators who had done great job. All your stakes at this stage are also doubled. At the same time, we add tasks for upgrading announcements and answering questions for extra stakes.  Very soon we will introduce amendments to the first post about basic terms.   We wish to thank everyone for the work done. Your involvement is very important for our project!

Author: Ilya_TeachMePlease
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: PRE-SALE TeachMePlease  On 27 November 2017 starts the PRE-SALE of the project in educational sphere TeachMePlease for which is being developed blockchain platform Disciplina.  Objectives of the project TeachMePlease: creation of the system of tools for an effective interaction between educational institutions, teachers and students; formation of the high-quality worldwide base of educational institutions and their programs; maintenance of the reliable rating of educational institutions and teachers; storage of information about grades that have ever been given, about issued documents which confirm completion of any kind of training. TeachMePlease doesn`t have territorial boundaries and already today provides a base of courses offered by educational institutions and private tutors to all those who wish to study.  Blockchain platform Disciplina ensures transparency and creates conditions for maintaining confidentiality and reliability of the information provided by members of the system.  Architecture of the platform Disciplina which is being developed uses all the opportunities of blockchain technology and modern trends in IT and distributed systems. It is an absolute universal blockchain platform for all educational projects.  Project is being implemented by the team of programmers from Saint-Petersburg in conjunction with Serokell - an international developer of distributed systems.  Terms of the PRE-SALE: +30%, you should submit an application in whitelist on the site https://teachmeplease.io to be accepted.

Author: BTCfarm
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Token sale Website | WHITEPAPER | Technical paper  DISCIPLINA is the first multifunctional blockchain to create verified personal profiles based on academic and professional achievements. Our project aims to make quality changes in the field of education and recruiting and aid the effective use of blockchain technologies.  DISCIPLINA is a brand new open-source private-public blockchain based on PoS-consensus for the demands of educational and recruiting services considering the specificity of their work.  DISCIPLINA will store the whole history of academic achievement of a person in blockchain, generating their personal score. It will allow recruiters to simplify the candidate search by their fields of expertise and skills required.  This blockchain is being developed from scratch by TeachMePlease team and former developers of Cardano (ADA coin).  The team consist of 45 people. Our team has a great experience in education and blockchain fields.  ‚ÄúI‚Äôve been predicting that by 2030 the largest company on the internet is going to be an education-based company that we haven‚Äôt heard of yet‚Äù Thomas Frey, the senior futurist at the DaVinci Institute  Advantages of the platform   ‚Ä¢   The opportunity to store the data on personal achievements in digital form and provide the access to the data through the unified platform which guarantees its permanence and credibility    ‚Ä¢   Monetisation of the stored data on student academic achievement through its trade to the recruiters. Fulfillment of obligations by all parties are guaranteed, and the option for cross-border payment provided   ‚Ä¢   DISCIPLINA is an open-source platform. Every educational or recruiting service will be able to use blockchain in their projects   ‚Ä¢   The opportunity of targeted education, when students have a certain milestones by completion of which they will be guaranteed the job in a given organisation   ‚Ä¢   Reliable information on ratings, feedbacks and student grades   ‚Ä¢   An effective search tool by candidates‚Äô achievements and their fields of expertise   Why are we developing our own blockchain architecture?  DISCIPLINA stores confidential information, such as the courses, students‚Äô tasks, grades, and test results. Therefore, public blockchain solutions, which store all of their transactions in open access ‚Äî Ethereum or EOS, for example ‚Äî are unacceptable. At the same time, private blockchain solutions, such as Hyperledger, do not provide enough verifiability of the data stored on them.    Minting in DISCIPLINA  Unlike traditional PoW mining, the DISCIPLINA platform provides energy-efficient PoS minting. The users will get rewards for any productive activity devoted to transaction processing and supporting the network. The network rewards the users proportionally to the volume of DSCP tokens on the balance of each user.  More about DISCIPLINA  Market       |   In June 2017 Sberbank confirmed the need in the system with the fair    |   history of achievements by giving the 1st price for the team    |   with the blockchain CV project on the annual hackathon.  Token sale The main payment tool on the platform will be the DSCP token together with a smaller payment unit named Logic. DSCP tokens distributed during the campaign will later be converted to native tokens in a 1:1 ratio after the start of DISCIPLINA MainNet (second half of 2019).  Tokensale is finished! Hardcap reached. Alpha version will be ready this August. Thank you for your interest in DISCIPLINA.   The users of DISCIPLINA platform will be able to issue a Cryptopay co-branding plastic card.  Attracted funds distribution  Team  Our team consists of over 45 experienced software developers, managers, and marketing specialists. We believe in having the whole team under one roof.   Contacts Worldwide: +3728803644 E-Mail: offers@disciplina.io TeachMePlease platform in the educational field: https://teachmeplease.com Token sale website and user profile: https://disciplina.io 2018 ¬© Disciplina O√ú, All right reserved Tallinn, Kesklinna linnaosa, Narva mnt 7-634, 10117

Author: BTCfarm
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Hey community!  1. DISCIPLINA Tokensale is finished!  The DISCIPLINA project, the first blockchain to create verified personal profiles based on academic and professional achievements, has finished its ICO. By the start of public presale the project had raised 28691.88 ETH. By the beginning of public tokensale the funds had reached 29060.04 ETH. Tokensale has been stopped on July 19 at 12:25 UTC due to the fact that the project has reached its hardcap. The DISCIPLINA team would like to thank everyone who supported the project and participated in the campaign. It was an important step for all of us! The team is currently finishing its work on the project alpha-version that will soon be available on the website.  2. A few words about our own blockchain architecture DISCIPLINA:  The platform will contain confidential information: classes, assignments, grades, and test results. Therefore, public blockchain solutions, such as Ethereum or EOS, which have open access to all transactions, cannot be used. At the same time, private blockchain solutions, such as Hyperledger, do not provide enough public verifiability. To ensure full support for the needs of the platform, a wholly new educational blockchain will be developed: DISCIPLINA   Private layer. The private segment does not allow any data except hashes to open access. This is done to store private and personal user data, as well as those materials that are protected by copyright or commercial confidentiality.  Public layer. The public segment provides the access to the data that verifies the integrity of the private chains and the reliability of the data stored by the network.  Educational institutions - any state or private online and offline organizations that conduct any and all educational activity. Tutors are also included. It can even be a simple marketplace offering the sale of study materials. Tutors, private teachers or small online marketplaces can cooperate in pools to not maintain DISCIPLINA node on their own. Every educational institution has its private chain and the opportunity to monetise educational records stored there.  Witnesses manage the public chain of blocks that will record hashes of the private blocks generated by each educational institution. To confirm the validity of blocks the witnesses uses a consensus algorithm. The permanence of the data stored in the private chains is guaranteed. The witnesses won‚Äôt have access to the data itself, only to the hashes of the data.  Recruiters and other interested parties are offered paid access to the information about the academic history and achievements of the students.  Minting in the DISCIPLINA. Unlike traditional PoW mining, the DISCIPLINA platform provides energy-efficient PoS minting. The users get rewards for any productive activity devoted to transaction processing and supporting the network. The network rewards the users proportionally to the volume of DSCP tokens on the balance of each user.  3. Dear community! We are proud to introduce you to some more details about our project.  TeachMePlease‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääthe first project based on DISCIPLINA, an educational blockchain platform  TeachMePlease is an international platform for the cooperation between educational institutions, tutors and students. This project helps students find and immediately pay for courses, registered by educational organizations or teachers. We can already offer our clients the services of an EdTech platform, but we are moving further. During the course of building this platform we have studied the issues faced by the members of the field of education, and have come to the conclusion that the field itself needs fundamental changes.  Read more on Medium  4. Education. Problems and solutions.  Education is becoming more available and decentralised, and as a result of this the students and teachers are facing both unquestionable benefits, and the issues connected with these developments. TeachMePlease will simplify the cooperation between teachers and students worldwide.  Read more on Medium  5. Blockchain system as a solution to problems in the field of education.  Read more on Medium  6. Interview with Ilya Nikiforov, Founder Of TeachMePlease.  Read more on ITMO.NEWS  7. Disciplina Blockchain Platform ‚Äì a Perfect World for Learning.  Read more on CoinIdol.Com  8. TeachMePlease, the First Project on Educational Blockchain Platform Disciplina.  Read more on Coinspeaker.Com

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: The platform‚Äôs main payment instrument is the DISCIPLINA Token (DSCP). DSCP tokens deposit and withdrawal is conducted through the user‚Äôs private cabinet on the web site as well as with the Cryptopay | DISCIPLINA plastic card with the Immediate exchange of tokens to fiat currencies.  Despite the fact that technically the payment exchanges between ecosystem members will be done in TMPT, due to the fact that there is currently a low level of familiarity with cryptocurrencies among average users, the account balance and course prices will be displayed in fiduciary currencies, and will be automatically converted to TMPT according to the current exchange rate.

Author: tchmpls.events
Title: [ANN] [HARDCAP REACHED] üéì DISCIPLINA ‚Äî the first blockchain for HR & Education
Body: Our platform was created not only to offer online courses. Surely, this is a very important part of platforms functionality, but our primary goal is to create useful and efficient tools for our users. Thus, a teacher who has knowledge but doesn‚Äôt know how to teach would be able to create his own educational course with our tools. In this way educational institutions would have effective instrument to control their teachers and to create online courses and programs. Students would have tools to search courses that suit their interests, to plan their activities and to communicate with teachers. Moreover, system of reliable comments and rating based on blockchain technology would be a very significant part of the platform. We want a person to have an ability to provide fair CV to the potential employer which will contain information about education and qualifications. To attain this goal, we`ll work with classic offline educational institutions to implement trustworthy register of student grades, achievements, & academic history and e-exams based on smart-contracts. Our platform is not a simple webinar software. It`s a complex solution in the field of education.
